website_summaries.verdict: Light users will do fine with Samsung's entry-level Galaxy J3, but you'll want a higher-powered phone if you plan to keep it around for two years or more.
pros: The inexpensive Samsung Galaxy J3 runs the current version of Android and takes nice daylight photos
It has a long-lasting, removable battery and the camera app launches with a double-click of the home button
cons: Its underpowered processor makes the photo-capture slow enough to miss action shots

customer_reviews.title: Affordable option
customer_reviews.text: This is a Verizon Pre Paid phone. You can activate it on your existing Verizon account but you have to activate it as a pre paid phone first (40$). Once it is activated as a prepaid phone call Verizon wireless 800 922 0204. Have your IMEI and Sim numbers for prepaid phone(J3) and the one you want to replace that is on your account, and they will do the swap. This is an affordable option 140$ as compared to purchasing a new phone (S7 700$!!).
customer_reviews.author: Jim Caffrey

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete and Insufficient. Do not Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This phone has only 8GB of internal storage and the system uses about of 5GB of it. That means you only have about 3GB for apps and whatever else. You might think you could work around that by taking advantage of Android's Adoptable Storage feature that lets you use an external SD card as internal storage, but Samsung disables this on all of their devices. If not for that, this might be an OK phone. Skip this and get the new J3 Mission with 16GB of internal storage.
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: Good basic smartphone if you don't want a bunch of apps.
customer_reviews.text: great basic smartphone, until i broke it. Not sure what happened but the motherboard cracked beneath the screen, likely my fault i'm hard on phones. Doesn't have very much internal memory (and a lot of apps won't save to sd card) so had to do the app shuffle (ie constantly deleting one to add a different one).
customer_reviews.author: meg walgren

customer_reviews.title: Not 16gb internal storage
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone because it said there was 16gb internal storage and there is only 8gb and 4gb are already used by pre installed apps! I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: kskeen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very good phone, but I couldn't connect it to any other company but verizon
customer_reviews.author: John H Hirschler

customer_reviews.title: Great smartphone
customer_reviews.text: I'm the type of individual that is computer & smartphone. I upgraded my cell phone with this. If I can work this - anyone can! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great phone upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! It is fast and performs great. The size is perfect. I added the otter box to it and it is holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jvoles

customer_reviews.title: I really love my new phone and the features that it has
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new phone and the features that it has!!! I took sometime to get use to because I had become so accustomed to my old phone but I'm glad that I made the switch!!!! I love the camera, screen size and photo quality!!! It's a great phone to say that it's only used by pre-paid customers!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable prepaid phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice affordable prepaid phone. Could use a little more internal storage space but overall good screen, calls, and volume.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with 8gb only two for eternal storage. And it's a bit slow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing phone. Just buy an SD card for it and you can have as many pictures, as much music, and as many games as you want.
customer_reviews.author: Shara Lea Collins

customer_reviews.title: Good service, however I did not realize it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Good service, however I did not realize it was a prepaid phone. We have to use the phone for 30 days with a different number before Verizon will replace it on the plan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got a really good price on this and it arrived 2 days before estimated delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jane York

customer_reviews.title: This phone sucks
customer_reviews.text: Dropped it off the dinner table and the liquid crystal behind the glass messed up. Waste of mobey
customer_reviews.author: PurplePrincess

customer_reviews.title: love this phone!!1!!!1
customer_reviews.text: This phone came in really fast and in great conditions,but there is no SIM card but this phone is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it and looks just like a new phone. Nothing wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mexican churro

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes samsung but this is a prepaid phone ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes samsung but this is a prepaid phone with a locked sim card that won't allow it to be put on our regular verizon account
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Nice looking. You get what you pay for. I like the phone. Did NOT WORK with REPUBLIC Wireless. Only a particular J3 model works on Republic. Mine did not. As far as I can tell you can't know the model # you will receive.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: it a good phone but the system alone takes up about 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: it a good phone but the system alone takes up about 5 gigs and when I try top move everything to the sd card it still states that im almost of space and it makes the phone act up all crazy...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought the more expensive phone to get not prepaid model ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the more expensive phone to get not prepaid model. It was the prepaid model. Seller didn't say that. Disapointed. Also was only 8 gig but I clicked to purchase the 16 gig.
customer_reviews.author: Ahales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone,great camera, and I Love the big screen!!! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: It's much faster and better than her last two phones
customer_reviews.text: This is a very reliable phone. My daughter loves it! It's much faster and better than her last two phones: the Moto G & the HTC M7. It's soft and sensitive to the touch. The battery life is good as well. It also has faster charging than the previous phones. It also came with a sim card, which was great. But I had to buy a 128gb Micro SD Card because of the phones internal storage of only 8gb. Overall the phone is amazing and great for my daughter! This was one of her going away gifts to college.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Fine print does not say this cell phone is only for prepaid users.
customer_reviews.text: Verizon could not program this phone with a number f or a regular long-time customer. This is a prepaid cell phone for teenagers with no credit.
customer_reviews.author: Dana J.

customer_reviews.title: be careful
customer_reviews.text: This phone was already in use with abalance and I had to return
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jane Beckland

customer_reviews.title: I just love my new phone
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new phone, it does almost everything that my daughters $600 phone does for a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best starter smartphone. Does everything I need it to do without making it too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months the constant updates sucked the memory right out of it
customer_reviews.text: And it's finally showing time to replace it. After 6 months the constant updates sucked the memory right out of it. If you had a bigger memory unit it be a damn good phone
customer_reviews.author: Lord Vimless

customer_reviews.title: Not an accurate listing
customer_reviews.text: Phone works well and is what I expected overall. However, under the description in the listing, it states it has an 8gb rom, but under features and details it states it has a 16gb rom. Unfortunately, it only has 8gb, which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not J3 6
customer_reviews.text: This is the model that is current on the shelf in stores, not the old one as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone at an excellent price. I have even learned to use twitter.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R. West

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AN 8 GB PHONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN 8 GB PHONE!!! I already own a Samsung J3 8GB phone and I keep getting "Memory low, some functions might not work" errors and the voice to text stops working. I have VERY few apps on it and it still gives me the errors and I have moved as many apps as possible to the memory card I bought and it still gives me errors. I bought this phone because it says in the description "Galaxy J3 V comes in 16GB and is available in Black" and it's an 8GB card. I had my phone mostly changed over and noticed that they lied in the description. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It kind of glitches out with like blue stripes on the screen but other than that perfect
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Functionally great! But companies add extra stuff to it that aren't in your best interest
customer_reviews.text: Phone functions well. Here are my only issues: Pictures are meh It has a program called dt ignite which you can't remove that installs bloatware. It optimizes for best wifi - not cool when you try to save in data usage and it decides to use its own wifi when you plug in a different wifi. Pros: Works great with sim cards! Works in uk Just beware that in uk at least there are things called premium numbers that providers dont account for. Lycamobile sim cards suck. Use vodaphone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for my daughter, she likes it a lot and we've had no problems. Did have to buy an SD card for more storage.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't  be happier!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this phone. It arrived early which was an added bonus. I am really new to smartphones, but it is everything I hoped for and more. I was up most of the night setting up just the way I wanted.I am very happy with Amazon and Samsung and Verizonwireless.
customer_reviews.author: Larbo

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for those that don't need alot of aps.
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this phone, so much got 2 more, one for my wife and daughter. Only issue is the memory. Don't get this one if you plan on having a lot of apps and games. For the price though, simple to use and can still have the apps I use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Stanford K Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price! I have not seen any lag time in any apps, streaming, or gaming. Not a lot of bloat ware in terms of the number of apps, but what is on there takes up a lot of the built in memory. Good thing it has an expandable memory port. Over all I am very pleased I went with this phone instead of a more pricey one!
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson. I haven't heard him complain about it. This is the second one, he lost the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bryden

customer_reviews.title: ... cell phone a couple month ago and it is fantastic, I really works good and no problems at ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this galaxy j3 cell phone a couple month ago and it is fantastic,I really works good and no problems at all.Very fast service .,
customer_reviews.author: john g.

customer_reviews.title: The description is a lie
customer_reviews.text: By the way, the description of this product is not correct... It specifically says that this is a 16 megabyte internal memory... I was very skeptical at first... And as to my gut feeling... It is 8 megabytes as the 2016 model describes... However specifically in this product description it says that there is a 16 megabyte internal memory that can be expanded with an SD card... Do not buy this product if this is what you're expecting... It is a disgrace that misinformation, that is very valuable to the customer, can be advertised and not fulfilled.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: called samsung and verison to tell them phone does not work and they said it was bad luck we did not purchase form them
customer_reviews.text: phone does not work, called samsung and verison to tell them phone does not work and they said it was bad luck we did not purchase form them, they would not help us. they tried factory reset and it did not do anything, they said the circuit was bad. now what do i just take it it the but as a loss or is it replaceable. phone was important for us to use card swipe for pay pal. left at show with no phone, purchased this phone for craft sales
customer_reviews.author: judy jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Sim card not included which is not clear in description, unable to activate on regular non prepaid account with Verizon, no means of communicating with seller online other than to return
customer_reviews.author: kittychats

customer_reviews.title: Poor experience with this one and had to return it
customer_reviews.text: Poor experience with this one and had to return it. All calls went to voice mail no matter what was done... caused me a tremendous amount of grief!
customer_reviews.author: TomZ

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: No memory. Had to buy a new phone 4 months later. If you want any apps, get a 16GB phone at least.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy J3, Verizon LTE Prepaid (Black)
product_meta.description: The Samsung Galaxy J3 prepaid has a slim and sleek design and allows you to enjoy the benefits of productivity and entertainment on the go. At 7.9mm thin, Galaxy J3 prepaid fits comfortably in your hand or pocket so you can scroll through photos or connect with friends and family with ease. This smartphone has a 5.0" inch HD super AMOLED display, which allows you to Get bright, full pictures every time. Listen, view and game more on the go with expandable memory. Simplify your experience when you turn on the easy mode feature, this allows you to Get to your favorites quicker. Galaxy J3 prepaid is powered by MSM8916, 1.2 GHz Quad Core processor and runs on Android 6.0.1 (Marshmallow). capture life's greatest moments on this 5MP camera or experiment and improve your photo skills with larger F/2.2 aperture, making it perfect for capturing those photos in low light. Galaxy J3 prepaid is 4G LTE enabled, features 1.5GB RAM and 8GB ROM. This smartphone has a 2600 mAh removable battery and supports up to 200GB Micro SD card. This device is packed with all the essentials you need to do what you want.
feature_bullets: Samsung Galaxy J3 V features VoLTE capabilities
Simplify your experience by turning on Easy Mode
Galaxy J3 V comes in 8GB and is available in Black
